passages.text:
The seat of the king's power. You look up at towering structure and proceed inside. 

[[Go to Throne Room->ThroneRoom]]

[[Go to Small Council Chamber->SmallCouncilChamber]]

[[Go to Tower of the Hand->TowerofHand]]

[[Go to Black Cells->BlackCells]]

links.name: Go to Tower of the Hand

passages.name: RedKeep

passages.text:
You stand in a richly decorated hall. At the far end, stands a monstrosity of a chair, made up of bent and broken sword blades. You approach the Iron Throne. 

[[Go underneath throne room->UnderThroneRoom]]
passages.name: ThroneRoom

passages.text:
You enter and find a long oaken table flanked by many chairs. 

[[Go to Maester's Laboratory->Maester'sLaboratory]]
passages.name: SmallCouncilChamber

passages.text:
You finish climbing the steps and find a compact stone room which houses an austere office and, beside it, a lavish bedroom. 

[[Go to Pyromancer's->Pyromancer's]]
passages.name: TowerofHand

passages.text:
You make your way into a vast basement which houses the skull of Balerion the Dread, along with the other remaining dragon skulls. 

[[Return to Throne Room->ThroneRoom]]
passages.name: UnderThroneRoom

passages.text:
You enter a room filled to the ceiling with dusty tomes. 

[[Return to Small Council Chamber->SmallCouncilChamber]]
passages.name: Maester'sLaboratory

passages.text:
You find yourself in a cramped and dimly lit room that glows faintly with green light. 

[[Return to Tower of the Hand->TowerofHand]]

links.name: Return to Tower of the Hand

passages.name: Pyromancer's

passages.text:
The stench of dispair assaults your senses as you descend into a pitch black chasm. 

[[Go to Flea Bottom->FleaBottom]]
passages.name: BlackCells

passages.text:
You exit out from behind the Red Keep and find yourself in the expanse of squat houses. 

[[Return to Black Cells->BlackCells]]
passages.name: FleaBottom
